FuncDef: This command assigns an ISA IPsec module configured in the specified slot to this IPsec group. The backup module provides the IPsec group with warm redundancy when the primary module in the group is configured. An IPsec group must always have a primary configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the card/slot identifying a provisioned module to be used as a backup module. Values-mda-id:	slot/mda
		slot 	1 to up to 10 depending on chassis model
		mda 	1 to 2.
